ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:46:47 [Issue ID 4000-179694] urn:comicvine:4000-179694 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-07 19:15:35. [Issue ID 179694]
ComicInfo.Summary: A horrible commercial airplane crash has claimed the lives of 153 people. Katchoo and David were on that plane, traveling to New York to claim his billion-dollar inheritance. As a distraught Francine arrives on the scene, she finds Katchoo alive but badly injured and David... missing! Was it all an unfortunate accident? When Katchoo receives a bedside phone call from Tambi, the horrible truth becomes clear. BONUS! This issue features a special full-color paperdoll insert on coated cardstock. Cut out the Francine and Katchoo figures on the insert and dress them in a variety of outfits that will appear on the back cover of upcoming SiP issues!
ComicInfo.Title: A Field of Lions
